name: Achluophobia (Painite)
description:
"There is an abandoned facility in the foggy forest."

Achluophobia is a atmospheric game in which you have to interact with arcane entities and decide what happened with them. You'll also be able to discover facts and stories about them,

Credits:

Background ambiance by ESN Productions.

Misc:

Made in under 72 hours for BenBonk Game Jam #4

Inspired by SCP Foundation and Project Moon's Lobotomy Corporation.

Color Palette:

Black: #000000

White: #FFFFFF

Purple: #7c128c

Red (Maroon): #5b0120
